Comment: Added support for second neopixel light strip
Added support to send pulses for photos
Added support for percentage viewing of statistics
Added support for digipot stepper controller for board
Added ability for M150 command to control individual led strip
Added ability to drive more than 128 leds on a neopixel
Added support for more than 3 axes to command M350 and M114
Added address flag to M3426 command
Added support for PCA9632 for the RGB_STARTUP_TEST
Added menu item to control pen for polargraph kinematics
Added ability to re-intialize AMX7219 on power supply on
